ygData.subject: Re: Dark Forge Bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: i was...and still am hoping for black =) though a nice new color would have been nice...a very deep blue or a dark ocean/forest green...the potential cookie
ygData.messageBody:
i was...and still am hoping for black =) though a nice "new" color would
have been nice...a very deep blue or a dark ocean/forest green...the
potential cookie cutter rubified look bothers me more than the actual color
red.

also, mismatch armor is more of a fashion sin as a troll that a de/human imo
=)

kg


>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Dark Forge Bracer
>Date: Tue, 19 Oct 1999 16:09:14 -0500
>
>Krukhan Garabash wrote:
> >
> > From: "Krukhan Garabash" <krukhan@...>
> >
> > hehe...rather confrontational aren't we =)
> >
> > it's generally safe to reason that all armor of one type will be the
>same
> > color, bronze, steel, rubi, mithril, umbral etc...so it would be *quite*
>odd
> > (and ugly) for darkforge to end up with a black bp and red bracers.
>though i
> > could see if the color/textures varied by race...troll as opposed to
> > whatever race your other friend is.
> >
> > -kg
>
>I'm just upset because I already have red bracers (and a black bp, for
>that matter) I really wanted it to be red tinted black, or a darker
>black than charred, or something unique.
>
>Xilith
